snippet: Over on The Upshot, Josh Barro looks into Jeb Bush’s pledge to increase G.D.P. growth to 4 percent annually, and how economists think it’s unrealistic.
abstract: Over on The Upshot, Josh Barro looks into Jeb Bush’s pledge to increase G.D.P. growth to 4 percent annually, and how economists think it’s unrealistic.

headline.main: Jeb Bush’s 4 Percent Growth Target Called Unrealistic by Economists
